title: Astronomy
subtitle: Astronomy
description: This quiz covers basic concepts in astronomy. While some questions relate to physics, all are conceptual based and they donâ€™t require problem solving skills. It should be used to review understanding of terms, and how well you can recall them. Topics include: Celestial sphere, sky motions, solar & lunar movements, origins of astronomy, notable scientists and figures, periodic motions, electromagnetic spectrum, telescopes, planets in the solar system, composition of the planets, and more.

title: Biology
subtitle: Biology
description: This quiz covers basic concepts in biology. It includes comprehensive topics taught in introductory biology classes, with most questions being concept based. It should be used to review understanding of terms, and important biological processes. Topics include: Basic chemistry, properties of water, energy and matter, domains of life, cells, membranes, enzymes, photosynthesis, cellular respiration, mitosis, meiosis, Mendelian / Non-Mendelian genetics, ecology, and more.
